text: "Vice City" (written in all lowercase) is a song by American rapper XXXTentacion. The song was released on March 4, 2014 on X's SoundCloud. It was re-released on January 28, 2022 through Columbia which would have been his 24th birthday. It appears on X's first mixtape XXX (Unmastered) and on the compilation album to his 2022 documentary Look at Me. The song was able to make it to #5 on RMNZ's Hot Singles Chart. It also made it to #32 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs, #89 on the Billboard Hot 100, and #40 on the Global 200 Billboard charts. The song's title is a reference to the 2002 video game, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. The song samples the 2013 song "Sing to the Moon" by singer Laura Mvula. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2014 songs Category:XXXTentacion songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Vice City (XXXTentacion song)
